title: Submission of Regulations issued under the Imports and Exports (Control) 	Act, No.1 of 1969, for approval of Parliament
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to submit the following Regulations issued under the Imports and Exports (Control) Act, No.1 of 1969, for approval of Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet:

	* Imports and Exports (Control) Regulations No.23 of 2022  published in	the  	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2309/40 dated 2022‑12‑09.

	* Imports and Exports (Control) Regulations No.24 of 2022, published in the 	    Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2311/08 dated 2022‑12‑19.

	* Imports Control Regulations on Payment Terms No.25 of 2022, published in 	   the  Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2311/18 dated 2022‑12‑21.
